scripts.build: concurrently -m 1 "docker network create net" "docker image prune -f" "vite build" "node -r dotenv/config ./config/build.js" "docker-compose -f ./build/docker-compose.yaml build" "docker image prune -f"
scripts.compile: concurrently -m 1 "docker network create net" "docker image prune -f" "vite build" "node -r dotenv/config ./config/build.js" "docker-compose -f ./build/docker-compose.yaml build" "docker image prune -f" "docker-compose -f ./build/docker-compose.yaml up"
